mapper.select: select r.id, r.name, r.code from tb_auth_role r, tb_auth_user_role ur where r.id=ur.role_id and r.`status`=0 and ur.`status`=0 and ur.user_id=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select r.* from tb_auth_role r, tb_auth_user_role ur, m_customer c where r.id=ur.role_id and ur.user_id=c.id and r.status=0 and ur.status=0 and c.status=0 and c.id=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and r.code=concat('USER_',#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER})
